name: Dralmorrer Borngray
languages: Common, Bullywug, Draconic, Elvish, Goblin, Sylvan

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: Dralmorrer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: War Magic
text: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

trait.name: Weapon Bond
text: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Dralmorrer is a 7th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): longstrider, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
• 2nd level (2 slots): magic weapon, misty step

action.name: Multiattack
text: Dralmorrer attacks twice, either with his longsword or dagger.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

spells: fire bolt, prestidigitation, shocking grasp, longstrider, magic missile, shield, thunderwave, magic weapon, misty step
description: Source: Hoard of the Dragon Queen p. 90
